trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Giritt's eyes light up at your arrival.
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_TODO_00<tab>Use the box of custom-made explosives to blow up the tempting bedrock.
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the chunks of twinkling ore to Giritt.

TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_000<tab>Lali-ho! Oh, you're that <var 09 E948 ((visitor)) ((visitor)) ((dwarf)) ((visitor)) ((visitor)) ((visitor)) ((visitor)) ((visitor)) /var> from...some faraway land. Tell me, friend: do you like explosions?

TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_001<tab>...That nervous thrill when you toss a bomb you've just made? The <var 1A 02 /var>satisfaction<var 1A 01 /var> of shattering a shelf of bedrock into tiny little pieces!? I pity the poor souls who've never known such joy!

TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_002<tab>You're a worldly <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>, ain't you? Promise not to lecture me about “danger” and “scaring the beardlings” like my milksop neighbors, and I'll let you test my latest batch of explosives!

TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_003<tab>Take these beauties, and throw one at the bedrock east of the village. The explosion's a reward in itself, of course, but if you're lucky, you might also hit a seam of ore. Bring any promising chunks back to me, and I'll let you know what you've found!
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_004<tab>Go and blow up some bedrock! There's a tempting outcrop just east of the village─toss a bomb at it, admire the destruction, then bring back any ore you find!
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_021<tab>Oh! Oooh! Do you know what this is...!?
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_022<tab>...Iron ore. It's a bit shiny, aye, but otherwise naught special for this area.
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_023<tab>Now, for the important part! How was the BOOM!? Wasn't it just the most amazing feeling ever!?
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_A1_000_002<tab>I thought I'd lose an eye...
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_024<tab>See! I knew you'd appreciate a good explosion!
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_025<tab>Ugh, you sound like my mother. I thought someone like you would... Well, never mind.
TEXT_LUCKZI013_03549_GIRITT_000_026<tab>Here─a few coins for the ore. Thanks for testing the bombs!
